pages.text: 10|62|Mi nasai. Arra no tomo ni wa hontoni osore mo naku, urei mo naidearou.
10|63|Kare-ra wa shinko shi,(arra o) osorete ita-sha-tachi.
10|64|Kare-ra ni taishite wa gense demo, raise ni oite mo kippo ga aru. Arra no o kotoba ni wa henko wanai. Sore koso wa idaina, kofuku no jojudearu.
10|65|Kare-ra no kotoba ni, anata no kokoro o itama sete wa naranai. Hontoni ken'no eiyo wa, subete arra no yudearu. Kare wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.

10|66|Mi nasai. Tenchi no subete no mono wa, hontoni arra no yudearu. Arra o sashioite, kamigami ni inotte iru-sha-tachi wa nani ni shitagau no ka. Kare-ra wa moso ni shitagatte iru dake. Jibungatte ni suginai.

10|67|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame yoru o sadame, sorede anata gata o ikowa se, mata hiruma o meimeihakuhaku ni sa reru katadearu. Hontoni sono nakaniha kikumimi o motsu hitobito ni taishi, shirushi ga aru.

10|68|Kare-ra wa,`arra wa hitori no ko o moke rareta.' To iu. Kare ni tatae are. Kare wa jisoku nasa reru okata. Tenchi no subete no mono wa, kare no yudearu. Anata gata wa kore ni taishite, ken'i wa nai nodearu. Arra ni tsuite, jibun no shiranai koto o kataru no ka.
10|69|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Arra ni tsuite uso o netsuzo suru mono wa, kesshite sakaenaidearou.'
10|70|Kare-ra wa konoyo de tsukanoma no kyoraku o nashi, sorekara ware no moto ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki ware wa, fushinjindeatta koto ni taishite kibishi chobatsu o aji wa serudearou.
